mapper.select: /* cetusBbs.view */ SELECT BBS_UID ,BBS_NM ,BBS_TP_CD ,USE_AT ,BBS_CL_USE_AT ,ATCH_AT ,ATCH_NUM ,UPLOAD_CPCTY ,ANSWER_USE_AT FROM CETUS_BBS WHERE BBS_UID = #{bbsUid}

/* cetusBbs.getAllWorkplaceBbs */ SELECT CB.BBS_UID ,CB.BBS_NM ,CB.BBS_TP_CD ,CASE WHEN CB.BBS_TP_CD = 'NOTICE' THEN '공지사항' WHEN CB.BBS_TP_CD = 'BOARD' THEN '자유 게시판' WHEN CB.BBS_TP_CD = 'FAQ' THEN 'FAQ' WHEN CB.BBS_TP_CD = 'QNA' THEN '1:1문의' END AS BBS_TP_CD_NM ,CB.USE_AT ,CB.REG_UID ,TO_CHAR(CB.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MMM-DD') AS REG_DT ,CU.USER_NM AS REG_NM ,CB.WORKPLACE_UID ,CW.NAME AS WORKPLACE_NM ,CB.BBS_CL_USE_AT ,CB.ATCH_AT ,CB.ATCH_NUM ,CB.UPLOAD_CPCTY ,CB.ANSWER_USE_AT ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CETUS_BBSCTT CBBSCTT WHERE CBBSCTT.BBS_UID = CB.BBS_UID AND CBBSCTT.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS BBSCTT_CNT FROM CETUS_BBS CB LEFT JOIN CETUS_USER CU ON CU.UID = CB.REG_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE CW ON CW.UID = CB.WORKPLACE_UID WHERE CB.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND CB.WORKPLACE_UID = #{workplaceUid}
